channel.title: Frozen Wolfv2 667/704 Eco
channel.description:
[ul][size=24pt][font=arial black]We Started![/font][/size] [b]Our unofficial website[/b] - [url=http://www.frozenwolf.net46.net/]http://www.frozenwolf.net46.net/[/url] [b]Base(s):[/b] Disturbed v2/Matrix __________________________________________________________________________ [img]http://img837.imageshack.us/img837/3183/cooltext667362736.png[/img] __________________________________________________________________________ Introduction About us Goals Section 4 The Applying Layout Staff list programs needed software __________________________________________________________________________ __________________________________________________________________________ 1.0 - Introduction You may be thinking why should i apply for Frozen Wolf staff. There is a high potential with a good team we can make it into the top 50 on the google top list in a short amount of time. __________________________________________________________________________ 2.0- About us you may be thinking why do I want a team can't i just do this by myself. The answer would be no, although i can make a great private server by myself i was inspired by the matrix team to put together a great team because of how much they got done as a team. __________________________________________________________________________ 3.0 - Goals Our %100 main goal is to make a perfect 667 with an economy! __________________________________________________________________________ 4.0 - Donations I know i have high goals set so if my dream comes true we will be handling a lot of donations so you may be thinking where will this all be going. for the first couple months %100 of the donations will be saved to make sure we have enough money to pay off our vps and website for a few months. After we have a surplus of money it will be distributed to our staff. __________________________________________________________________________ 5.0 - The Applying Layout Here is the layout:
In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: E-mail address?: What position do you want?: How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday? (3 hours+): Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any Suggestions?: Proof of experience?:
__________________________________________________________________________ 6.0 - Staff List Head Developer 1/1 Cia Nick Server Coders: 0/2 OPEN! OPEN! Suggestors: 0/2 OPEN! OPEN! Web Designers: 1/1 James(ingame)/tehjamdude Client/Server Coder/Web designer (This Position is like an all around guy): 1/1 202685 Client Coder: 0/1 OPEN! 7.0 - Programs needed -Dropbox [img]https://www.dropbox.com/static/21640/images/logo.png[/img] -Teamviewer [img]http://www.teamviewer.com/styles/teamviewer.png[/img] 8.0 - Software (recommended not a deal breaker)(not all of them just one!) -Windows 7 [img]http://cloud.addictivetips.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/02/energy-flow-windows-7-by-gyppi.jpg[/img] -Windows xp [img]http://www.ebcak.com/wp-content/uploads/2008/05/windows_xp.jpg[/img] [img]http://img442.imageshack.us/img442/8323/capturecc.png[/img] __________________________________________________________________________[/ul]

item.title: Frozen Wolfv2 667/704 Eco
item.dc:creator: @cia_nick cia nick
item.description:
@cia_nick wrote:

[ul][size=24pt][font=arial black]We Started![/font][/size]

Our unofficial website - http://www.frozenwolf.net46.net/

Base(s): Disturbed v2/Matrix

Introduction
About us
Goals
Section 4
The Applying Layout
Staff list
programs needed
software

1.0 - Introduction
You may be thinking why should i apply for Frozen Wolf staff. There is a high potential with
a good team we can make it into the top 50 on the google top list in a short amount of
time.

2.0- About us
you may be thinking why do I want a team can’t i just do this by myself. The answer would
be no, although i can make a great private server by myself i was inspired by the matrix team
to put together a great team because of how much they got done as a team.

3.0 - Goals Our %100 main goal is to make a perfect 667 with an
economy!

4.0 - Donations I know i have high goals set so if my dream comes
true we will be handling a lot of donations so you may be thinking where will this all be going.
for the first couple months %100 of the donations will be saved to make sure we have enough
money to pay off our vps and website for a few months. After we have a surplus of money
it will be distributed to our staff.

5.0 - The Applying Layout

Here is the layout:

In-Game Name/Server Forums Name?: How old are you?: E-mail address?: What position do you want?: How long have you coded (ignore if not chosen Coder)?: What time zone are you in?: How long will you be on everyday? (3 hours+): Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any Suggestions?: Proof of experience?:
__________________________________________________________________________

6.0 - Staff List

Head Developer

1/1

Cia Nick

Server Coders:

0/2

OPEN!
OPEN!

Suggestors:

0/2

OPEN!
OPEN!

Web Designers:

1/1

James(ingame)/tehjamdude

Client/Server Coder/Web designer (This Position is like an all around guy):

1/1

202685

Client Coder:

0/1

OPEN!

7.0 - Programs needed

-Dropbox

-Teamviewer

8.0 - Software (recommended not a deal breaker)(not all of them just one!)

-Windows 7

-Windows xp


__________________________________________________________________________[/ul]

Read full topic
